snippet: The Institute for Supply Management said Monday that its index of factory activity slipped to 50.1 points in October from 50.2 in September.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says index of factory activity fell to 50.1 points in October from 50.2 in September.
lead_paragraph: The Institute for Supply Management said Monday that its index of factory activity slipped to 50.1 points in October from 50.2 in September.

headline.main: Factory Activity Grows at Slowest Pace Since ‘13
headline.print_headline: U.S. Factory Activity Grows at Slowest Pace Since 2013
